name: Hinduja Engineering Enterprises
overview:
Hinduja Engineering Enterprises is a partnership based business venture, which was established in the year 1999 at Secunderabad, Andhra Pradesh.

Products & Services: VDF Floorings Mastic Floorings Acid Resistant Floorings Epoxy Floorings Vinyl Floorings Wooden Floorings Anti Static Floorings Elotene Solid Floorings

Our Team: We have hired best pool of professionals from the industry as our team members. These professionals possess extensive expertise in their respective fields, which help them efficiently achieve assigned targets within the given time frame.

Our Quality Standards: In order to maintain high-end quality standards in our products and services, we use only finest grade materials in our business related processes. We practice rigorous quality control program in our manufacturing process to deliver highly reliable product line in the market.

Client Satisfaction: Being a client-centric organization, we focus to render maximum satisfaction to our valued clients in every aspect. Our prior aim is to render those products and services to the clients that completely meet their actual demands and requirements.

Vendor Base: We aim at offering our clients optimum quality products that are in compliance with their requirements. For the same, our professionals carry out exhaustive research in the market to choose our vendor base.
